name: netlify
title: Netlify
description: Search your Netlify sites, deploys, domains, team members, audit log, and official documentation.
author: destiner

commands.name: find-local-sites
commands.title: Find Local Sites
commands.subtitle: Netlify
commands.description: Find your Netlify sites that you have saved locally on your hard drive.

preferences.name: scanPath
preferences.title: Scan path
preferences.description: Path to scan for finding local Netlify sites. Use : to separate multiple paths.

commands.name: invite-team-members
commands.title: Invite Team Members
commands.subtitle: Netlify
commands.description: Invite new people to join your team.

commands.name: search-domains
commands.title: Search Domains

commands.description: Search your team's domain names, and register new domains.

commands.name: search-team-members
commands.title: Search Team Members
